Description: MVP Phase
Base
Basic ui with juno brands
Innovative UI libraries & frameworks are used
Swap Page
Possibility to connect a wallet with a dedicated button
Possibility to set the slippage with a dedicated button
Possibility to choose the assets pair to swap via UI
Assets price
Price impact
Route
Pools Page
View of Combined APR, Total Liquidty, 24h Volume, Fees, Liquidity
UI with two different section: My pools & All Pools
Possibility to sort pools by: Total Liquidity, Combined APR
UI to monitor and control the liquidity provided (pool's data, possibility to remove liquidity)
View of Pending rewards, My liquidity, Shares
Possibility to provide liquidity to pools via UI
Possibility to claim pending rewards with a dedicated button
Tokens Page
View of Balance, TVL, Volume and price
Possibility to sort Tokens by: Balance, TVL, Volume
Possibility to deposit & withdraw Tokens with a dedicated button
Possibility to swap Tokens with a dedicated button
Balance view
Bridge Page
Possibility to select networks pair and asset to bridge via UI
Possibility to select 50% or Max tokens with two dedicated Button
Possibility to review bridging data (costs, routes, estimated time) via information box before confirming the action.
Manage Swap fees from Juno Governance
Possibility to change swap fees globally
Possibility to change swap fee per pool
Possibility to change fee recipients among Juno SubDAOs
Possibility to send fees to a custom contract that will handle the distribution
Tokenless governance: management by JUNO only thorugh Juno x/gov module
Skip integration
Allow the DEX to be added to the fair MEV mechanism already supported on Juno chain
Allow the DEX to be added to the Skip aggregation UIs like ibc.fun
Allow deposits/withdrawals with the Skip API
MORE FEATURES Phase
Create Pool Page
UI to choose the assets pair to create a new constant product pool
Incentivate Pool Page
Possibility to choose the pool to be incentivized
Possibility to choose the incentivization duration
Possibility to choose the incentivization method (time-fixed or time-decreasing)
Possibility to choose the token with which to incentivize
Dark Mode
Guides/Docs Page
Varius link to Github, Juno Website, Discord
Various automatic risk indication for tokens when swap
Implement approved feedbacks from the previous phase
TESTING Phase
Release to a small group of testers, including Juno Development Department members
Collect feedback & questions
Implement UI Refinements
FINAL RELEASE Phase
Release all code with open source licensing
Deploy the contract on Juno mainnet
Deploy the UI on agreed upon hosting
SUPPORT Phase (for 6 months from completion of the Final Release phase)
Fix bugs
Support CosmWasm minor version upgrades
Support CosmJS minor version upgrades
Implement Security upgrades
Support developers
Finalize refinements from the Testing phase
Respond to questions from the Testing phase
